lbl.title: VO Wizard
lbl.heading: Create a Virtual Organization
lbl.finishMessage:
Just one more step...

Click Finish, and the wizard will finalize your configuration.
There are two possible endings of this process
  1. If any error occurs, you will be notified. In this case you will be able to fix them.
  2. If everything wen right, you will be redirected to your new VO-s page.

msg.noValidVO: First you must create an organization
msg.entitlementpackAddError: Failed to add {{entitlementpack}} to the organization!
